entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 30 March 2023
